channel.title: Need 2 easy scripts for arcade games!
channel.description:
yo its me Nejat here, hehe
aight i need a script that follows a color all the time, like in the ping pong games where the ball goes to the left and right all the time ( and i want to be able to change the colors) and the second script i want it to follow a color just like the first script i asked for, BUT it shall also left-click all the time, its for the soccer games where u gotta click on the ball all the time. hope someone can make it for me, cya and Respect!

http://www.moparisthebest.com/java/

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

HTML… just figure it out by looking at websites’ source code. You don’t really need an in depth understanding of it.

You can only learn a programming language unless you actually are into it.

item.title: Need 2 easy scripts for arcade games!
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Did it work? If you havent tested it please do. Just to be sure.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 03:38:15 PM[/size][hr]This should work

program New; var x,y :integer; const football = 16777215; //football color begin repeat if(findcolor(x,y,football,1,1,255,543)) then //remeber to change themovemouse(x,y) xs,xe,ys,ye coordinates clickmouse(x,y,true); until(false); end.

Read full topic

item.title: Need 2 easy scripts for arcade games!
item.dc:creator: @nejat nejat
item.description:
@nejat wrote:

thank you SOOOOOOO MUCH!!! i could kiss your ass man , hehe (joking, or i would do it if u were a nice hot girl) hehehe Respect and tnx again[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 11:24:56 AM[/size][hr]sorry for double posting BUT the script that is going to follow the same color doesnt do it, it just follows like 1 sec then it executes so i have to sit and press [CTRL]+[ALT]+R all the time so if u could make it follow all the time, and what do u mean by changing the cords? cause i dont know anything about SCAR:P respect!

EDIT: the one that is supposed to click on the ball all the time only clicks 1 time then ends, i appreciate you trying to help me here, and i know its not easy but could you plz fix this??? Respect, and tnx

item.title: Need 2 easy scripts for arcade games!
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

The first one is almost the same as the one that autoguy posted, but then withouth clickmouse:

[code]program New;
var x, y : integer;

const ballcolor=0; //Put the color of the ball here
begin
if findcolor(x, y, ballcolor, 0, 0, 1000, 1000) then //replace the coords
movemousesmooth(x, y)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need 2 easy scripts for arcade games!

item.title: Need 2 easy scripts for arcade games!
item.dc:creator: @autoguy autoguy
item.description:
@autoguy wrote:

the second one is easy, try this:
[scar]program New;
var x,y :integer;
const
football = 16777215; //football color
begin
if(findcolor(x,y,football,1,1,255,543)) then //remeber to change the
movemouse(x,y); //xs,xe,ys,ye coordinates
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end.
[/scar]

If it changes colors as in the first one it get a bit harder to make, I’m too tried to think about it, I might try to make it later

Read full topic
